summary.p: No matter how much he writes, he receives no answer. Why? He asks Bullinger to finally report to him on the state of affairs in Zurich, about which he urgently wants to know more details. The people of Basel are worried. Greetings to Heinrich Utinger and all fellow believers.

div.p: Greetings. As often as I write, I receive nothing in return. What could be the reason? I ask you to respond regarding those matters about which you know how eagerly I wish to be informed, especially about your situation. For every day we receive some bad news and because of this, we are quite disturbed. Therefore, let us take some consolation, or if there is none, let us be more troubled, so that we may call upon the Lord more fervently, that His name may be sanctified.
Farewell with all the brothers, especially Utinger.
